name: YUNA
description:
Yuna is a story-driven puzzle platformer about a traveler helping others work together to get stronger.

Created for Brackeys 5th Game Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5

Submission Link: 

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5/rate/929693

(Leave a rating!)

Credits:

Noor Binte Amir - Art, Development, Narrative ,Game Design and Sound Design.

https://noor-binte-amir.itch.io/

Hammad Aamer - Development, Narrative ,Game Design and Sound Design.

All the art used in the game is completely original.

All sounds are self created besides the soundtrack.

Free Soundtrack "It goes on" by Albert Chang from album "reboot.exe".
